org.md2k.datakit.logger

Class DatabaseLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • org.md2k.datakit.logger.DatabaseLogger

  • public class DatabaseLogger
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    Provides wrapper methods for managing calls to database table methods.

      • DatabaseLogger

        public DatabaseLogger(android.content.Context context,
                      java.lang.String path)
        Constructor

        This method initializes the data storage system to log data to both SQLite and gzip files.

        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        path - Path to the database.
